## /activities

Miscellaneous activities you can do.

### /activities plank_make

**Usage**

- `/activities plank_make action:<string> type:<string> [quantity:<integer>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `action` | `string` | Yes | The method you wish to make planks. | Demon Butler, Sawmill |
| `type` | `string` | Yes | The type of planks to make. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity of planks to make. | - |

### /activities chompy_hunt

**Usage**

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `action` | `string` | Yes | Start a Chompy hunting trip, or claim hats. | - |

## /bank

See your minions bank.

**Usage**

- `/bank [page:<integer>] [item:<string>] [items:<string>] [format:<string>] [search:<string>] [filter:<string>] [sort:<string>] [flag:<string>] [flag_extra:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `page` | `integer` | No | The page in your bank you want to see. | - |
| `item` | `string` | No | The item you want to pick. | - |
| `items` | `string` | No | Type a bank string to lookup | - |
| `format` | `string` | No | The format to return your bank in. | - |
| `search` | `string` | No | Text to search your bank with. | - |
| `filter` | `string` | No | The filter you want to use. | - |
| `sort` | `string` | No | The method to sort your bank by. | - |
| `flag` | `string` | No | A particular flag to apply to your bank. | - |
| `flag_extra` | `string` | No | An additional flag to apply to your bank. | - |

### /bingo manage_bingo

**Usage**

- `/bingo manage_bingo bingo:<string> [add_tile:<string>] [csv_dump:<boolean>] [remove_tile:<string>] [finalize:<boolean>] [add_extra_gp:<integer>] [trophy_handout:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `bingo` | `string` | Yes | The bingo. | - |
| `add_tile` | `string` | No | Add a tile to your bingo. | - |
| `csv_dump` | `boolean` | No | Dump a csv file with all the bingo results. | - |
| `remove_tile` | `string` | No | Remove a tile from your bingo. | - |
| `finalize` | `boolean` | No | Finalize/end the bingo. | - |
| `add_extra_gp` | `integer` | No | Add extra gp to the prize. | - |
| `trophy_handout` | `boolean` | No | Hand out trophies. | - |

## /chop

Chop logs using the Woodcutting skill.

**Usage**

- `/chop name:<string> [quantity:<integer>] [powerchop:<boolean>] [forestry_events:<boolean>] [twitchers_gloves:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The tree you want to chop. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity of logs you want to chop (optional). | - |
| `powerchop` | `boolean` | No | Set this to true to powerchop. Higher xp/hour, No loot (default false, optional). | - |
| `forestry_events` | `boolean` | No | Set this to true to participate in forestry events. (default false, optional). | - |
| `twitchers_gloves` | `string` | No | Change the settings of your Twitcher's gloves. (default egg, optional) | - |

**Examples**

- `/chop name:Logs`

## /cl

| `type` | `string` | No | The type of log you want to see. | - |
| `flag` | `string` | No | The flag you want to pass. | - |
| `flag_extra` | `string` | No | An additional flag you want to pass. | - |
| `all` | `boolean` | No | Show all items? | - |

**Examples**

- `/cl name:Boss`

## /config

Commands configuring settings and options.

### /config server channel

**Usage**

- `/config server channel choice:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `choice` | `string` | Yes | Enable or disable commands for this channel. | Enable, Disable |

### /config server pet_messages

**Usage**

- `/config server pet_messages choice:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `choice` | `string` | Yes | Enable or disable Pet Messages for this server. | Enable, Disable |

### /config server command

**Usage**

- `/config server command command:<string> choice:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `command` | `string` | Yes | The command you want to enable/disable. | - |
| `choice` | `string` | Yes | Whether you want to enable or disable this command. | Enable, Disable |

### /config user bank_sort

**Usage**

- `/config user bank_sort [sort_method:<string>] [add_weightings:<string>] [remove_weightings:<string>] [reset_weightings:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `sort_method` | `string` | No | The way items in your bank should be sorted. | - |
| `add_weightings` | `string` | No | Add custom weightings for extra bank sorting (e.g. '1 trout, 5 coal') | - |
| `remove_weightings` | `string` | No | Remove weightings for extra bank sorting (e.g. '1 trout, 5 coal') | - |
| `reset_weightings` | `string` | No | Type 'reset' to confirm you want to delete ALL of your bank weightings. | - |

### /config user favorite_alchs

**Usage**

- `/config user favorite_alchs [add:<string>] [remove:<string>] [add_many:<string>] [reset:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |

| `remove` | `string` | No | Remove an item from your favorite alchables. | - |
| `add_many` | `string` | No | Add many to your favorite alchables at once. | - |
| `reset` | `boolean` | No | Reset all of your favorite alchs | - |

## /create

Allows you to create items, like godswords or spirit shields - and pack barrows armor sets.

**Usage**

- `/create item:<string> [quantity:<integer>] [showall:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The amount you want to create. | - |
| `showall` | `boolean` | No | Show all creatable items. | - |

## /gear

Manage, equip, unequip your gear.

### /gear equip

**Usage**

- `/gear equip gear_setup:<string> [items:<string>] [item:<string>] [preset:<string>] [quantity:<integer>] [auto:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `gear_setup` | `string` | Yes | The gear setup want to select. | - |
| `items` | `string` | No | A list of equippable items to equip. | - |
| `item` | `string` | No | The item you want to equip. | - |
| `preset` | `string` | No | The gear preset you want to select. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity you want to equip (optional). | - |
| `auto` | `string` | No | Automatically equip the best gear you have for a certain style. | - |

| `item` | `string` | No | The item you want to unequip. | - |
| `all` | `boolean` | No | Unequip everything in this setup? | - |

Light logs to train Firemaking.

**Usage**

- `/light name:<string> [quantity:<integer>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The logs you want to burn. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity you want to burn (optional). | - |

**Examples**

- `/light name:Logs`

## /lvl

See a level in your OSRS stats.

**Usage**

- `/lvl rsn:<string> skill:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `rsn` | `string` | Yes | The runescape username to check | - |
| `skill` | `string` | Yes | The skill you want to select. | - |

**Examples**

- `/lvl rsn:Magnaboy skill:Mining`

- `/mass monster:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `monster` | `string` | Yes | The boss you want to mass. | - |

**Examples**

- `/mass name:General graardor`

## /mine

Send your minion to mine things.

**Usage**

- `/mine name:<string> [quantity:<integer>] [powermine:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The thing you want to mine. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity you want to mine (optional). | - |
| `powermine` | `boolean` | No | Set this to true to powermine. Higher xp/hour, No loot (default false, optional). | - |

**Examples**

- `/mine name:Runite ore`

## /mix

Mix potions to train Herblore.

**Usage**

- `/mix name:<string> [quantity:<integer>] [wesley:<boolean>] [zahur:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The potion you want to mix. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity you want to mix (optional). | - |
| `wesley` | `boolean` | No | If available, pay Wesley to crush items. (optional). | - |
| `zahur` | `boolean` | No | If available, pay Zahur to clean herbs. (optional). | - |

**Examples**

- `/mix name:Prayer potion`

## /offer

Offer bones or bird eggs.

**Usage**

- `/offer name:<string> [quantity:<integer>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The thing you want to offer. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity you want to offer (optional). | - |

**Examples**

- `/offer name:Dragon bones`

## /open

Open an item (caskets, keys, boxes, etc).

**Usage**

- `/open [name:<string>] [quantity:<integer>] [open_until:<string>] [result_quantity:<integer>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | No | The thing you want to open. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity you want to open (defaults to one). | - |
| `open_until` | `string` | No | Keep opening items until you get this item. | - |
| `result_quantity` | `integer` | No | The number of the target item you want to obtain before stopping. | - |

## /pay

**Usage**

- `/pay user:<user> amount:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `user` | `user` | Yes | The user you want to send the GP too. | - |
| `amount` | `string` | Yes | The amount you want to send. (e.g. 100k, 1m, 2.5b, 5*100m) | - |

## /raid

Send your minion to do raids - CoX or ToB.

### /raid cox start

**Usage**

- `/raid cox start type:<string> [challenge_mode:<boolean>] [max_team_size:<integer>] [quantity:<integer>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `type` | `string` | Yes | Choose whether you want to solo, mass, or fake mass. | - |
| `challenge_mode` | `boolean` | No | Choose whether you want to do Challenge Mode. | - |
| `max_team_size` | `integer` | No | Choose a max size for your team. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity to do. | - |

**Usage**

**Parameters**

_No parameters._

### /raid tob start

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `solo` | `boolean` | No | Solo with a team of 3 bots. | - |
| `hard_mode` | `boolean` | No | Choose whether you want to do Hard Mode. | - |
| `max_team_size` | `integer` | No | Choose a max size for your team. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity to do. | - |

**Parameters**

## /runecraft

Sends your minion to craft runes with essence, or craft tiaras.

**Usage**

- `/runecraft rune:<string> [quantity:<integer>] [usestams:<boolean>] [daeyalt_essence:<boolean>] [extracts:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `rune` | `string` | Yes | The Rune/Tiara you want to craft. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The amount of runes/tiaras you want to craft. | - |
| `usestams` | `boolean` | No | Set this to false to not use stamina potions (default true) | - |
| `daeyalt_essence` | `boolean` | No | Set this to true to use daeyalt essence (default false) | - |
| `extracts` | `boolean` | No | Set this to true to use extracts (default false) | - |

**Examples**

- `/runecraft`

## /sacrifice

Sacrifice items from your bank to the bot.

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `items` | `string` | No | The items you want to sacrifice. | - |
| `filter` | `string` | No | The filter you want to use. | - |
| `search` | `string` | No | A search query for items in your bank to sacrifice. | - |

**Examples**

- `/sacrifice items:10k trout, 5 coal`

| `filter` | `string` | No | The filter you want to use. | - |
| `search` | `string` | No | A search query for items in your bank to sell. | - |

## /trade

Allows you to trade items with other players.

**Usage**

- `/trade user:<user> [send:<string>] [receive:<string>] [price:<string>] [filter:<string>] [search:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `user` | `user` | Yes | The user you want to trade items with. | - |
| `send` | `string` | No | The items you want to send to the other player. | - |
| `receive` | `string` | No | The items you want to receieve from the other player. | - |
| `price` | `string` | No | A shortcut for adding GP to the received items. | - |
| `filter` | `string` | No | The filter you want to use. | - |
| `search` | `string` | No | An optional search of items by name. | - |
